remarks: Derivative of a polynomial, explicit sum version.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 13-Nov-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvply1.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ( ( A ` k ) x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) ) $.
dvply1.g $e |- ( ph -> G = ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... ( N - 1 ) ) ( ( B ` k ) x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) ) $.
dvply1.a $e |- ( ph -> A : NN0 --> CC ) $.
dvply1.b $e |- B = ( k e. NN0 |-> ( ( k + 1 ) x. ( A ` ( k + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
dvply1.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
dvply1 $p |- ( ph -> ( CC _D F ) = G ) $.
$d A k z $.
$d B z $.
$d N k z $.
$d k ph z $.
